publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3539 Alex Neil: Immediate Establishment of Public Appointments Committee—That the Parliament calls upon the Parliamentary Bureau to consider and propose the establishment of a Parliamentary Public Appointments Committee initially to oversee the current Office of the Commissioner for Public Appointment as its work relates to Scottish Executive appointments pending the establishment of a Scottish Commissioner for Public Appointments, after which the remit of the committee shall be to carry out interviews and recommend an individual for the post of Scottish Commissioner for Public Appointments once the Public Appointments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Bill has been passed; scrutinise the work of the Scottish Commissioner and, specifically, the Commissioner’s annual report; take appropriate action when the Commissioner reports a breach in the Code of Conduct for making public appointments; ask the commissioner for guidance on particular appointments; and interview all major appointees to non-departmental public bodies on their appointment to discuss the policy and priorities of that body.
S1M-3539 Immediate Establishment of Public Appointments Committee (lodged on 5 November 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3539 Immediate Establishment of Public Appointments Committee (lodged on 5 November 2002) Ms Sandra White*
